channel.title: Posts on Alexander Eble
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Alexander Eble

item.title: CarHunt
item.description: CarHunt is a software as a service for cross-portal comparison and acquisition of profitable used cars.

item.title: Air Support
item.description: Air Support researches air quality forecasting in office environments.

item.title: Tourist Typology
item.description: Tourist Typology is an application that calculates and visualizes a dynamic user clustering of tourists based on image ratings.

item.title: FlexPowerHub
item.description: FlexPowerHub is a Software as a Service product for energy trading which allows professional users to gain individual insights of the energy market.

item.title: Expo Generator
item.description: Expo Generator is a SaaS product that allows you to create apps in the browser without any technical knowledge.
